name: Biome (thenonsense)
description:
demo v.02_16

Explore strange game world. When your vehicle die, soul form can catch another vehicle. In vault placeholders (destination points on radar) you can sell first two items from inventory.

Vehicle can catch living weapon creature - it gives him shoot ability.

Level have only two restrict walls and other directions is endless.

Controls:

WASD - movement
mouse - aim weapon (and autocam)
Space - jump
Left Mouse Button - shoot
Q,E - strafe
Enter - show/hide inventory and controls
1 - on/off autocam
2,3 - change zoom
PgUp - random impulse

Hacker options (for test):

4 - near view
Home - soul form on/off
End - spawn enemy
PgDown - spawn weapon
